data.description: Ties .ini files to hash, supports arrays
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This little module is very simple, can be used with the (to be
    uploaded) module wx:PythonCardDlg. (www.pythoncard.org), which reads
    PythonCard resource files for dialogs and builds one for you with
    wx:perl.
